00002 import wx.lib.stattext

00004 class IndividualPanel(wx.Panel):
00005 
00006     def __init__(self, parent, id, widget_style, grid, ui_data, size = None):
00007         wx.Panel.__init__(self, parent = parent, size = (300,200), style = wx.SIMPLE_BORDER)
00008 
00009         self.parent = parent
00010         self.id = id
00011 
00012         gridSize = [10,2]
00013         
00014         widgets = {}
00015         widgets['label'] = wx.lib.stattext.GenStaticText
00016         widgets['slider'] = wx.Slider
00017         widgets['button'] = wx.Button
00018         widgets['textbox'] = wx.TextCtrl
00019         widgets['combobox'] = wx.Choice
00020         self.widgets = widgets
00021 
00022         #self.SetBackgroundColour(tuple(widget_style[0]))
00023         self.SetBackgroundColour(widget_style[0])
00024 
00025         sizer = wx.GridSizer(gridSize[0], gridSize[1], 2, 2)
00026 
00027         wIndex = 1
00028         for j in xrange(gridSize[0]):
00029             for k in xrange(gridSize[1]):
00030                 if grid[j*gridSize[1] + k] > 0:
00031                     _widget = self.addWidget(ui_data[grid[j*gridSize[1]+k]])
00032                     # set bg color
00033                     _widget.SetBackgroundColour(widget_style[wIndex])
00034                     #_widget.SetForegroundColour(widget_style[0])
00035                     sizer.Add(_widget, 1, border = 5, flag=wx.EXPAND)
00036 
00037                 else:
00038                     sizer.Add((20,5))
00039 
00040 
00041         sizer.Layout()
00042 
00043         self.sizer = wx.BoxSizer(wx.VERTICAL)
00044         self.bestLabel = wx.lib.stattext.GenStaticText(self, -1, "Best:")
00045         self.worstLabel = wx.lib.stattext.GenStaticText(self, -1, "Worst:")
00046 
00047         self.bestLabel.SetFont(wx.Font(11, wx.NORMAL, wx.NORMAL, wx.BOLD))
00048         self.worstLabel.SetFont(wx.Font(11, wx.NORMAL, wx.NORMAL, wx.BOLD))
00049         self.bestLabel.Hide()
00050         self.worstLabel.Hide()
00051 
00052         self.sizer.Add(self.bestLabel, 0, wx.EXPAND)
00053         self.sizer.Add(self.worstLabel, 0, wx.EXPAND)
00054         self.sizer.Add(sizer)
00055 
00056         self.Layout()
00057 
00058 
00059         #self.sizer.Fit(self);
00060         #self.sizer.SetSizeHints(self)
00061         self.SetSizer(self.sizer)
00062 
00063 
00064         self.Bind(wx.EVT_LEFT_DOWN, self.bestSelect, self)
00065         self.Bind(wx.EVT_RIGHT_DOWN, self.worstSelect, self)
00066 
00067         #self.Bind(wx.EVT_LEFT_DCLICK, self.parent.onBestSelect, self)
00068         #self.Bind(wx.EVT_RIGHT_DCLICK, self.parent.onWorstSelect, self)

00072     def getID(self):
00073         return self.id
00074 
00075 #------------------------------------------#
00076     def unSelect(self):
00077         self.bestLabel.Hide()
00078         self.worstLabel.Hide()
00079 
00080 #------------------------------------------#
00081     def bestSelect(self, event):
00082         self.bestLabel.Show()
00083         self.worstLabel.Hide()
00084         self.Layout()
00085         self.parent.onBestSelect(self.id)
00086 
00087 #------------------------------------------#
00088     def worstSelect(self, event):
00089         self.bestLabel.Hide()
00090         self.worstLabel.Show()
00091         self.Layout()
00092         self.parent.onWorstSelect(self.id)
00093 
00094 
00095 #------------------------------------------#
00096     def addWidget(self, widget):
00097         _widget = None
00098         if widget['name'] == 'label':
00099             _widget = self.widgets['label'](self, -1, widget['value'])
00100 
00101         elif widget['name'] == 'textbox':
00102             _widget = self.widgets['textbox'](self, -1, widget['value'])
00103 
00104         elif widget['name'] == 'button':
00105             _widget = self.widgets['button'](self, -1, widget['value'])
00106 
00107         elif widget['name'] == 'slider':
00108             _widget = self.widgets['slider'](self, -1, size = widget['size'])
00109 
00110         elif widget['name'] == 'combobox':
00111             _widget = self.widgets['combobox'](self, -1, size = widget['size'], choices = eval(widget['value']))
00112 
00113         return _widget
00114
